page.title: 02GATESHEAD STADIUM
page.content: { Gateshead Stadium}is an international athletics venue. Many famous athletes have competed here e.g.{Brendan Foster,Seb Coe,Steve {Cram.} Ordinary people can use the stadium for lots of activities.{Three thousand people go there each week to play badminton, football, tennis and many other things.It cost{eight million} pounds to build. Many{St.Wilfrid's}children go to play there or spectate at the important events. We are also very lucky because we are allowed to use all the facilities for our school P.E. lessons. The school is only a short walk from the stadium.
